name: The Charlton Chair
description: With a nod to the exemplary elegance of Art Deco design, the sophisticated Charlton brings a sense of prestige to your dining room, home office or bedroom. The plush, padded interior and sleek frame, along with the tasteful piping, create a chair that will flatter any stylish room scheme. A dark-tinted beech has been chosen for the frame, awarding the chair a smart sleekness. Like many DAVIDSON pieces, this chair is an adaptable design that is available with or without arms, depending on your desired look. The Charlton can also be upholstered in a range of fabrics or leathers to suit your interior.
